about_the_game:
About

It's about a role-playing game with turn-based combat mechanics and choices that have a relative impact on the world.

The general concept of the game

In this world with 9 different kingdoms, it allows the main character, who starts as an ordinary person, to lead a daily life or to have a say in the village, town, city or country (depending on the intervention effect). The people in the game (regardless of the main character) have their own life cycle. Preferred professions (but not all) provide some advantages and disadvantages. Relationships with other characters (not effective in this version) have an effect in a good or bad way (there may be more influence depending on the other character's profession).

Feature highlights

Regardless of the main character, the characters on the map continue their life cycle.
Each character has a system of relationships with the main character and other characters. Characters have their own professions.
It is a world of magic and swords set in the medieval time period.
It contains some of the main features of the sandbox game genre.
Developed with RPG Maker Mz, it is aimed to make the role-playing experience as simple as possible and uncomplicated to play, so that the player can control it comfortably.
The main character can get a profession Currently, the main character can earn income by taking and completing tasks that are allowed to be taken by the user through waiter, porter (transporting materials from point a to point b), mining and guild.

The following sections are under planning and/or construction and are subject to change.

It can have an impact on the region through relationships or professions. Villages do not have administrators. Towns may be headed by an administrator (district governor) and may vary from country to country. There is a governor in the cities, but the security guards at the gate do not allow every passer-by to meet. Capitals have a king and/or queen and it is only possible to meet under certain conditions (the public is not allowed except in exceptional cases). There may also be a prince and/or princess. Administrators can walk around the zone in different outfits to conduct supervision within the zone.
Wandering merchants aim to travel between regions and buy products from cheap markets and sell them at high prices (they can have cheap or expensive products in the stores within the region) on a weekly and/or monthly basis.
Borders are suitable for illegal crossing, but in case of caught, criminal action is applied and may vary from country to country. The practice of execution is common in times of war. It is possible to pass between countries with a transition document, and there is also the opportunity to travel quickly to certain regions.
Professions such as farming, diplomatic/political professions (the main character cannot do it in this version), merchant (over the price difference between cities and/or items that fall and are considered loot) are provided with the opportunity to earn money and status.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 sp1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 2100 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 sp1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5-4430 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A role-playing game where the player can interact with npc in the game world and have a real-time life cycle. The relationships of the found NPCs among themselves and with the player have an effect on the region they are in and the relations with the surrounding regions.
